comment: Theorem 19.38 of [Margaris] p. 90. The converse holds under non-freeness conditions, see ~ 19.38a and ~ 19.38b . (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.) Allow a shortening of ~ 19.21t . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 2-Jan-2018.)
